body_html: I am seeing a similar problem running tensorflow on AWS p2.8xlarge instances. It is inconsistent in that some instances seem to have this problem and others do not. In fact, I am only seeing the problem with spot instances and not regular (on-demand) instances.
body_text: I am seeing a similar problem running tensorflow on AWS p2.8xlarge instances.  It is inconsistent in that some instances seem to have this problem and others do not.  In fact, I am only seeing the problem with spot instances and not regular (on-demand) instances.
body: I am seeing a similar problem running tensorflow on AWS p2.8xlarge instances.  It is inconsistent in that some instances seem to have this problem and others do not.  In fact, I am only seeing the problem with spot instances and not regular (on-demand) instances.
